UseCase: Sentiment analysis of reviews / social medias / blogs
Name: Amazon reviews
Description: US product reviews from Amazon.com.

UseCase: Sentiment analysis of reviews / social medias / blogs
Name: OpinRank Review Dataset
Description: Reviews of cars and hotels from Edmunds.com and TripAdvisor respectively.

Name: MovieLens
Description: 22,000,000 ratings and 580,000 tags applied to 33,000 movies by 240,000 users.

Name: Yahoo! Music User Ratings of Musical Artists
Description: Over 10M ratings of artists by Yahoo users.

UseCase: Sentiment analysis of reviews / social medias / blogs
Name: Car Evaluation Data Set
Description: Car properties and their overall acceptability.

Name: YouTube Comedy Slam Preference Dataset
Description: User vote data for pairs of videos shown on YouTube. Users voted on funnier videos.

Name: Skytrax User Reviews Dataset
Description: Teaching assistant reviews.

Name: Enron Email Dataset
Description: Emails from employees at Enron organized into folders.

Name: Ling-Spam Dataset
Description: Corpus containing both legitimate and spam emails.

Name: SMS Spam Collection Dataset
Description: Collected SMS spam messages.

Name: Twenty Newsgroups Dataset
Description: Messages from 20 different newsgroups.

Name: Spambase Dataset
Description: Spam emails.

Name: NYSK Dataset
Description: English news articles about the case relating to allegations of sexual assault against the former IMF director Dominique Strauss-Kahn.

Name: The Reuters Corpus Volume 1 & 2
Description: Large corpus of Reuters news stories in English.

Name: Saudi Newspapers Corpus
Description: 31,030 Arabic newspaper articles.

Name: RE3D (Relationship and Entity Extraction Evaluation Dataset)
Description: Entity and Relation marked data from various news and government sources. Sponsored by Dstl

Name: Examiner Spam Clickbait Catalogue
Description: Clickbait, spam, crowd-sourced headlines from 2010 to 2015

Name: ABC Australia News Corpus
Description: Entire news corpus of ABC Australia from 2003 to 2019

Name: Worldwide News - Aggregate of 20K Feeds
Description: One week snapshot of all online headlines in 20+ languages

Name: Reuters News Wire Headline
Description: 11 Years of timestamped events published on the news-wire

Name: News Headlines Dataset for Sarcasm Detection
Description: High quality dataset with Sarcastic and Non-sarcastic news headlines.

Name: Credit Card Transactions
Description: 284,000 transactions over two days, of which less than 500 are fraudulent.

Name: Multilingual Spoken Words Corpus
Description: The dataset contains more than 340,000 keywords, totaling 23.4 million 1-second spoken examples (over 6,000 hours).

Name: People's Speech
Description: It includes 30,000+ hours of transcribed speech in English languages with a diverse set of speakers.

Name: UC Berkeley Enron Email Analysis
Description: A categorized version of the Enron Email Dataset. Main topics are: coarse genre, included/forwarded information, primary topics, and emotional tone.

Name: The RVL-CDIP Dataset
Description: The dataset consists of 400,000 grayscale images in 16 classes, with 25,000 images per class.

Name: Severstal: Steel Defect Detection
Description: This dataset if about localizing and classifying surface defects on a steel sheet.

Name: The FLAME dataset
Description: This dataset consists of different repositories including raw aerial videos recorded by drones' cameras and also raw heatmap footage recorded by an infrared thermal camera.

Name: FireNET
Description: 500 fire images with bounding boxes in pascal voc XML format.

Name: Fire Detection from CCTV on Kaggle
Description: Dataset organised for classification task of normal/smoke/fire, no bounding box annotations.

Name: Dataset by jackfrost1411
Description: Several hundred images sorted into fire/neutral for classification task.

Name: 1.88 Million US Wildfires
Description: The following core data elements were required for records to be included in this data publication: discovery date, final fire size, and a point location at least as precise as Public Land Survey System (PLSS) section (1-square mile grid).

Name: Wildfire Smoke Dataset
Description: 737 annotated (bounding boxed) images

Name: Domestic-Fire-and-Smoke-Dataset
Description: Approx. 5000 unique images, 2-class (fire and smoke), bounding box annotation, COCO, PASCAL VOC and YOLO formats

Name: MovieTweetings
Description: Movie rating dataset based on public and well-structured tweets

Name: Sentiment140
Description: Tweet data from 2009 including original text, time stamp, user and sentiment.

Name: Twitter Dataset for Arabic Sentiment Analysis
Description: Arabic tweets.

Name: Dutch Social media collection
Description: This dataset contains COVID-19 tweets made by Dutch speakers or users from Netherlands. The data has been machine labeled

Name: Reddit All Comments Corpus
Description: All Reddit comments (as of 2015).

Name: Ubuntu Dialogue Corpus
Description: Dialogues extracted from Ubuntu chat stream on IRC.

Name: Legal Case Reports
Description: Federal Court of Australia cases from 2006 to 2009.

Name: DEXTER Dataset
Description: Task given is to determine, from features given, which articles are about corporate acquisitions.

Name: Common Voice
Description: A public domain database of crowdsourced data across a wide range of dialects.

Name: LJSpeech
Description: A single-speaker corpus of English public-domain audiobook recordings, split into short clips at punctuation marks.

Name: Artificial Characters Dataset
Description: Artificially generated data describing the structure of 10 capital English letters.
